jobDescription: Data Analyst  Are you tired of working on the same products that don't provide value to the world? Are you looking to make a difference while building products that actually improve people's lives daily in an exciting startup environment? With nearly 100 million regular users in over 125 countries globally, our products are changing the way educators, teachers, parents & student interact & communicate on a daily basis. Due to our constant growth, our team needs to bring on 2-3 Data Analysts (2-3 yrs through Lead Level) to help us continue to scale out & build new products. Ready to join a mission-driven company where you will know your work actually makes a difference in the world? Apply today!What You Will Be Doing
